CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Number_of_Loans_Scenerios_Run__c) || Number_of_Loans_Scenerios_Run__c = 0,
'Not Started' ,
IF(
AND( Number_of_Loans_Scenerios_Run__c > 0, NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Qualified'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Disqualified') ) )
) ,
'In Progress' ,
IF(
AND( Number_of_Loans_Scenerios_Run__c > 0, OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Qualified'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Disqualified') ) ) ,
'Completed'
,
'Error')))
CustomField.label: Run Loan Scenarios
